column2: "Na Satan soɛree tsiaa Israel
column3: na onuu David mu dɛ ɔnkɛkan Israel."

column2: "Na David see Joab na ɔman no mu asafohemfo no dɛ
column3: Hom nkɔ nkɛkan Israel mfi Beer-seba araa nkodu Dan na hom mbɛka nkyerɛ me

column2: "Na Joab see dɛ
column3: EWURADZE nyɛ ne man dɛ mbrɛ wɔtse yi mpɛn ɔha so nka ho: na
column5: ana hɔn nyinara nnyɛ mo wura no nkowaa bi a? Ɔyɛ dɛn ntsi na mo wura rohwehwɛ dɛm adze yi? Ɔyɛ dɛn ntsi na iyi bɛyɛ asodzi ama Israel yi?"

column2: "Naaso nna otwar dɛ Joab yɛ dza ɔhen no ahyɛ no no. Dɛm ntsi Joab fii edzi na osii mu kekyinii faa Israel nyinara mu
column3: na ɔbaa Jerusalɛm."

column2: "Na Joab dze ɔman no hɔn anobu no dodow no brɛɛ David. Na hɔn a wofi Israel mu nyinara wɔyɛ ɔpepe na mbarimba a wɔkɔ akono so mpem ɔha: na Juda yɛ mbarimba mpemahaanan eduosuon a wɔkɔ akono."
"Na Levi na Benjamin dze
column3: ɔannkan hɔn ammfora: osiandɛ nna ɔhen n'asɛm no yɛ Joab tan."

column2: "Na Nyankopɔn ammpɛ dza David yɛe no; dɛm ntsi ɔbɔɔ Israel."
"Na David see Nyankopɔn dɛ
column3: Mayɛ bɔn kɛsenara
column4: dɛ mayɛ dɛm adze yi: na afei
column6: yi w'akowaa no bɔn kɔ; na mayɛ nkwaseadze dodow."

column2: "Na EWURADZE kaa kyerɛɛ Gad
column3: David n'adzehunyi no
column8: Ndzɛmba ebiasa na medze si w'enyim; fa no mu kor

column2: "Na Gad baa David nkyɛn
column3: na ɔbɛsee no dɛ

column2: "dɛ mfe ebiasa ɔkɔm; anaa abosoom ebiasa a wɔbɛsɛɛ wo wɔ w'atamfo enyim aber a w'atamfo afona roto wo; anaaso EWURADZE n'afona
column3: mekyerɛ asaase no do nyimpa ɔyardɔm
column4: ndaansa a EWURADZE no bɔfoe dze bɛsɛɛ nyimpa wɔ Israel mbew nyinara do. Afei hwɛ mbuae kor ma memfa nsan nkɛma nyia ɔsomaa me no."

column2: "Na David see Gad dɛ
column3: Mo ho akyer me papaara: afei ma monhwe EWURADZE nsamu; na n'adɔyɛ dɔɔ so dodow: na mma monnhwe ɔdasanyi nsamu."

column2: "Nna EWURADZE maa ɔyardɔm baa Israel do: na Israel mu nyimpa mpemeduosuon wuwui."
"Na Nyankopɔn somaa ɔbɔfo ma ɔkɔr Jerusalɛm dɛ ɔnkɛsɛɛ no: na aber a ɔrebɛsɛɛ no
column3: nna EWURADZE hwɛe
column4: na ɔsesaa n'adwen wɔ hɔn ho
column5: na ɔsee ɔbɔfo a ɔresɛɛ no dɛ
column6: Ayɛ yie; afei gyina wo nsa. Na EWURADZE no bɔfoe no gyinaa Jebusnyi Ornan n'ewuporowee no ho."

column2: "Na David maa n'enyiwa do
column3: na ohun EWURADZE no bɔfoe no dɛ ogyina asaase na ɔsor ntamu
column4: na afona a wɔatwe kitsa ne nsamu
column5: na ɔatsen no wɔ Jerusalɛm do. Nna David na amampanyin no a wofurafura eyitam no

column2: "Na David see Nyankopɔn dɛ
column3: Ana nnyɛ mara na mehyɛɛ dɛ wɔnkan ɔman no? Mbom mara nye nyia ɔayɛ bɔn na ɔabɔ mbusu yi; na nguan yi dze
column7: na m'egya fi do; na mma ɔmmba wo man do

column2: "Nna EWURADZE no bɔfoe no hyɛɛ Gad dɛ ɔnkɛse David dɛ ɔmfow nkɔ nkesi afɔrmbukyia mma EWURADZE wɔ Jebusnyi Ornan n'ewuporowee ho."
"Na David fowee kɔree dɛ mbrɛ Gad n'asɛm a ɔkae no EWURADZE ne dzin mu no tse."
"Na Ornan daan noho
column3: na ohun ɔbɔfo no; na ne mbabanyin baanan a wɔka no ho no wɔdze hɔnho sumae. Nna Ornan roporow ewifua."

column2: "Na aber a David dur Ornan nkyɛn no
column3: Ornan hwɛe na ohun David
column4: na ofiir edzi fii ewuporowee ho
column5: na ɔkotoow David na ɔdze n'enyim boom famu."

column2: "Nna David see Ornan dɛ
column3: Fa ewuporoweebea yi ma me
column4: ma minsi do afɔrmbukyia memma EWURADZE: no bo a odzi no ara pɛr na fa ma me: ama woeesianka ɔyardɔm no efi ɔman no do."

column2: "Na Ornan see David dɛ
column3: Gye fa
column4: na ma mo wura ɔhen nyɛ dza oye wɔ n'enyiwa do: hwɛ
column5: mema wo anantwi a wɔdze bɔbɔ ɔhyew afɔr
column6: na ɔporow ndadze a wɔdze bɛpaa nyena
column7: na ewifua a wɔdze bɛyɛ edziban afɔr: medze ne nyina mema."

column2: "Na ɔhen David see Ornan dɛ
column3: Oho; na ɔtɔ ara na mebɛma bo a ɔfata dze atɔ: osiandɛ mennkɛfa adze a ɔyɛ wodze ama EWURADZE
column4: afei so mennkɛfa adze a annsom me bo biara abɔ ɔhyew afɔr."

column2: "Nna David maa Ornan sika a woeker dwetɛbona ahaesia dze tɔɔ bea no."
"Na David sii afɔrmbukyia wɔ hɔ maa EWURADZE
column3: na ɔbɔɔ ɔhyew afɔr na asomdwee afɔr
column4: na ɔsɔɔr EWURADZE; na ɔdze gya fi sor gyee no do wɔ ɔhyew afɔrmbukyia no do."

column2: "Na EWURADZE hyɛɛ ɔbɔfo no; na ɔdze n'afona no sanee hyɛɛ bɔha no mu."
"Na David hun dɛ EWURADZE agye no do wɔ Jebusnyi Ornan ewuporowee hɔ
column3: nna ɔbɔɔ afɔr wɔ hɔ."

column2: "Nna EWURADZE ne ntamadan a Moses yɛe no wɔ sar no do
column3: na ɔhyew afɔr mbukyia no so wɔ sorɔnsorɔmbea a ɔwɔ Gibeon no aber no mu."

column2: "Naaso David enntum annkɔ ɔno n'enyim ennkebisa Nyankopɔn: osiandɛ osuroi wɔ EWURADZE no bɔfoe afona no ntsi."
